# ZigTUI Cross-platform TUI library for Zig, inspired by [Ratatui](https://github.com/ratatui/ratatui). ![ZigTUI Dashboard](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adxdits/zigtui/master/dashboard.gif) ## Features

# ZigTUI Perpustakaan TUI lintas platform untuk Zig, terinspirasi oleh [Ratatui](https://github.com/ratatui/ratatui). ![Dasbor ZigTUI](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adxdits/zigtui/master/dashboard.gif) ## Fitur

RowTranslations.originContent: Cross-platform TUI library for Zig, inspired by [Ratatui](https://github.com/ratatui/ratatui).
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Perpustakaan TUI lintas platform untuk Zig, terinspirasi oleh [Ratatui](https://github.com/ratatui/ratatui).

Content:
- **Cross-platform** ‚Äî Windows, Linux, macOS
- **Efficient rendering** ‚Äî Cell-based diffing, only redraws what changed
- **Widgets** ‚Äî Block, Paragraph, List, Gauge, Table
- **15 built-in themes** ‚Äî Nord, Dracula, Gruvbox, Catppuccin, Tokyo Night...
- **Kitty Graphics Protocol** ‚Äî Display images (with Unicode fallback)
- **No hidden allocations** ‚Äî Explicit memory management

## Requirements

- Zig 0.15.0+
- Windows 10+ / Linux / macOS

## Installation
Translation:
- **Lintas platform** ‚Äî Windows, Linux, macOS
- **Rendering efisien** ‚Äî Diffing berbasis sel, hanya menggambar ulang yang berubah
- **Widget** ‚Äî Blok, Paragraf, Daftar, Pengukur, Tabel
- **15 tema bawaan** ‚Äî Nord, Dracula, Gruvbox, Catppuccin, Tokyo Night...
- **Kitty Graphics Protocol** ‚Äî Menampilkan gambar (dengan fallback Unicode)
- **Tanpa alokasi tersembunyi** ‚Äî Manajemen memori eksplisit

## Persyaratan

- Zig 0.15.0+
- Windows 10+ / Linux / macOS

## Instalasi

RowTranslations.originContent: - **Efficient rendering** ‚Äî Cell-based diffing, only redraws what changed
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - **Rendering efisien** ‚Äî Diffing berbasis sel, hanya menggambar ulang yang berubah

RowTranslations.originContent: - **15 built-in themes** ‚Äî Nord, Dracula, Gruvbox, Catppuccin, Tokyo Night...
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - **15 tema bawaan** ‚Äî Nord, Dracula, Gruvbox, Catppuccin, Tokyo Night...

RowTranslations.originContent: - **Kitty Graphics Protocol** ‚Äî Display images (with Unicode fallback)
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - **Kitty Graphics Protocol** ‚Äî Menampilkan gambar (dengan fallback Unicode)

Content:
**Available:** `default`, `nord`, `dracula`, `monokai`, `gruvbox_dark`, `gruvbox_light`, `solarized_dark`, `solarized_light`, `tokyo_night`, `catppuccin_mocha`, `catppuccin_latte`, `one_dark`, `cyberpunk`, `matrix`, `high_contrast`

Run `zig build run-themes` to preview all themes.

## Examples
Translation:
**Tersedia:** `default`, `nord`, `dracula`, `monokai`, `gruvbox_dark`, `gruvbox_light`, `solarized_dark`, `solarized_light`, `tokyo_night`, `catppuccin_mocha`, `catppuccin_latte`, `one_dark`, `cyberpunk`, `matrix`, `high_contrast`

Jalankan `zig build run-themes` untuk melihat semua tema.

## Contoh

RowTranslations.originContent: Run `zig build run-themes` to preview all themes.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Jalankan `zig build run-themes` untuk melihat semua tema.

Content:
```bash
zig build run-dashboard   # System monitor demo
zig build run-kitty       # Image display demo  
zig build run-themes      # Theme showcase
```
Translation:
```bash
zig build run-dashboard   # System monitor demo
zig build run-kitty       # Image display demo  
zig build run-themes      # Theme showcase
```

RowTranslations.originContent: zig build run-dashboard   # System monitor demo
RowTranslations.translatedContent: zig build run-dashboard   # System monitor demo

RowTranslations.originContent: zig build run-kitty       # Image display demo
RowTranslations.translatedContent: zig build run-kitty       # Image display demo

Content:
## Kitty Graphics

Display images in terminals that support the [Kitty Graphics Protocol](https://sw.kovidgoyal.net/kitty/graphics-protocol/). Falls back to Unicode blocks automatically.
Translation:
## Grafik Kitty

Menampilkan gambar di terminal yang mendukung [Protokol Grafik Kitty](https://sw.kovidgoyal.net/kitty/graphics-protocol/). Secara otomatis beralih ke blok Unicode jika diperlukan.

RowTranslations.originContent: Display images in terminals that support the [Kitty Graphics Protocol](https://sw.kovidgoyal.net/kitty/graphics-protocol/). Falls back to Unicode blocks automatically.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Menampilkan gambar di terminal yang mendukung [Protokol Grafik Kitty](https://sw.kovidgoyal.net/kitty/graphics-protocol/). Secara otomatis beralih ke blok Unicode jika diperlukan.

RowTranslations.originContent: const image = tui.Image{ .data = bmp.data, .width = bmp.width, .height = bmp.height, .format = .rgba };
RowTranslations.translatedContent: const image = tui.Image{ .data = bmp.data, .width = bmp.width, .height = bmp.height, .format = .rgba };

Content:
**Supported:** Kitty, WezTerm, foot, Konsole (partial)  
**Fallback:** Windows Terminal, iTerm2, Terminal.app

## Platform Support

| Platform | Terminal | Notes |
|----------|----------|-------|
| Windows 10+ | Windows Terminal, WezTerm | Native Console API |
| Linux | Any ANSI-compatible | POSIX termios |
| macOS | Kitty, WezTerm, Terminal.app | POSIX termios |

## License

MIT

## Contributing

Issues and PRs welcome.
Translation:
**Didukung:** Kitty, WezTerm, foot, Konsole (sebagian)  
**Cadangan:** Windows Terminal, iTerm2, Terminal.app

## Dukungan Platform

| Platform | Terminal | Catatan |
|----------|----------|---------|
| Windows 10+ | Windows Terminal, WezTerm | Native Console API |
| Linux | Terminal kompatibel ANSI apa saja | POSIX termios |
| macOS | Kitty, WezTerm, Terminal.app | POSIX termios |

## Lisensi

MIT

## Kontribusi

Isu dan PR dipersilakan.

RowTranslations.originContent: | Windows 10+ | Windows Terminal, WezTerm | Native Console API |
RowTranslations.translatedContent: | Windows 10+ | Windows Terminal, WezTerm | Native Console API |
| Linux | Terminal kompatibel ANSI apa saja | POSIX termios |

RowTranslations.originContent: | macOS | Kitty, WezTerm, Terminal.app | POSIX termios |
RowTranslations.translatedContent: | macOS | Kitty, WezTerm, Terminal.app | POSIX termios |
